title: starting a ranked team
body:
hey guys, looking to start a team for end of this season and working into next, i am a support main and have exp in jg roles! stuck in b4 but was scraping silver at start and unfortunately got stuck with teemo lovers. I dont rage and i play a lot so if any one is keen to have a bit of fun and win some games let me know! Add me or leave a post on here

gg

replies.body:
I'll be happy to join, been hoping to join a team for while now.
I main ADC but can play all lanes.

*Love The Rift
*Drive to improve 
*Good attitude

Hope i get the chance to try out
-TheChadMizer
Keen to join the team, add me and I'll join. B3 adc main
im keen to join a team, currently s5, can play any role pretty well, send me a message if you want me :)
ive got a bronze and silver account id be keen to smurf for you guys im a diamond adc and i wanna start streaming so would be fun let me know

hey, im keen to join a team. sick of soloqâ€¦. battling to climb. just got relegated from s5 to b1 :'( 
ill play anywhere except support/adc. if you get enough people interested shoot me a message/add in game xo

I don't really play excessively, but i can definitely find time each night for a game.
Played league for a long time and although i play very very casually, (never really tried to climb rank ladders and tend to aram and normal alot) the last time i played i was S2 so at least my MMR must be decent. Haven't touched ranked since due to no motivation and elo decay has set me in S4 now. If you can find or know other players enough for a team i would love to join. I can pretty much main any and every role as i am equally good at all of them.
If i had to choose though i would prefer either adc or top.
Thanks!
